summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3397, for the improvement of West Massachusetts Street and West Seattle Street, each from 42nd Avenue Southwest to Sunset Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42166 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
